comments_header: What is comments' header called in task status
files_set: What bot texts when users have attached files
commented: What bot texts when users have commented
file_attach_prompt: Attach files, if you have none hit OK
What bot says when users want to attach files
greeting_message: The first message of the bot
phone_number_prompt: What bot texts when asks for phone number
admin_password_prompt: What bot texts when asks admin password
application_sent: Your applictaion will be reviewed soon
What bot texts when appplication is sent
appliaction_waiting: Your applictaion will is being reviewed
What bot texts when user checks appliction status
user_accepted: What users see when they are accepted
user_rejected: What users see when they are rejected
user_notification: What users see when they are notified manually
user_reminder: What users see when they are reminded hourly
start_after_registration: What bot texts when /start is sent
write_comment_prompt: What bot says when user wants to comment

admin: I am admin button in registration
user: I am user button in registration
file: Attch file button in task status
accept: Accept button in users task status
complete: Complete button in users task status
edit: Edit button in admin task status
notify: Notify button in admin task status
highlight_symbol: What symbol to use to highlight buttons
attached_symbol: What symbol to use to show 'user does not acceptd the task yet' status
accepted_symbol: What symbol to use to show 'user acceptd the task' status
completed_symbol: What symbol to use to show 'user completed the task' status
